meanings.def: accepted or deserving to be accepted as one of the best or most important of its kind
examples: a classic film/story/car/game
I grew up listening to classic rock.
a classic novel/study/goal
This classic novel was first published in 1938.

meanings.def: with all the features you would expect to find; very typical
examples: a classic example of poor communication
This was a classic case of what not to do.
She displayed the classic symptoms of depression.
I made the classic mistake of clapping in a pause in the music!

meanings.def: attractive, but simple and traditional in style or design; not affected by changes in fashion
examples: a classic grey suit
classic design
a classic look
a classic movie/​work
a classic example/​mistake
classic design
a classical composer
a classical theory
a classical scholar
classical mythology.
She was wearing a classic little black dress.
The shop specializes in classic English style.

meanings.def: people say That’s classic! when they find something very funny, when they think somebody has been very stupid or when something annoying, but not surprising, happens
examples: She's not going to help? Oh, that's classic!

meanings.def: a book, film or song which is well known and considered to be of very high quality, setting standards for other books, etc.
examples: The film is now a cult classic.
The song became an instant classic.
The novel may become a modern classic.
English classics such as ‘Alice in Wonderland’
His book is something of a classic of the genre.
one of the true classics of French cinema
Charles Dickens's timeless classic, ‘Oliver Twist’
one of the great classics of English literature

meanings.def: a thing that is an excellent example of its kind
examples: That match was a classic.
The second goal was an absolute classic.
The professor's reply was a classic.

meanings.def: a piece of clothing, a vehicle or other item that is admired for its beautiful style or design that is not affected by changes in fashion
examples: Classics don't lose their style.
We pick out some collectors' cars and modern classics.

meanings.def: the study of ancient Greek and Roman culture, especially their languages and literature
examples: a degree in Classics
